name: Alcohol Focus Scotland
membership:
Member of EUROCARE
Member of UK Alcohol Health Alliance
goal: Advocate for evidence-based policies to reduce the harm caused by alcohol.
interests: Competition, Consumers, Culture and media, Public Health, Taxation
euInitiatives:
-EU alcohol strategy - or current lack of it.
- Operation of EU free trade rules applying to alcohol, which impact negatively on health
- Impact of directive on structure of excise duty on alcohol on public health
- Impact of directive on AVMS on public health
